h4.a: Message From North College Hill Mayor's Court

div.div: NCH Mayor's Court Will Be Suspended Until Further Notice Read on...

The past few weeks have been extremely difficult for us as a nation. The Coronavirus (COVID-19) has abruptly changed our lifestyles, but we choose to remain positive and continue working together to get through this. Read on...

h4.a: If you are sick with COVID-19 or think you might have it

div.div: Follow the link below to help protect other people in your home and community. Read on...
The Ohio General Assembly has introduced legislation (HB 565) to extend the filing and payment due date for state and municipal income taxes from April 15, 2020 to July 15, 2020.

div.div: Pies Park is private property now. Read on...
